text:
Hola! Salam Aleykum! Namaste! Bonjour!
This is your polyglot Pro😎
This last video will be specially for our international students! You will learn about migration rules in Russia and how to prolong your documents in time.
It's essential to know as Russian rules are rather strict.
Breath in...breath out...and go! Come on this is the last one!🙌
